prompt_generator.title: Prompt Generator
prompt_generator.role_placeholder: Define the LLM role (e.g., 'You are an expert assistant in...')
prompt_generator.context_placeholder: Describe the context and specific situation
prompt_generator.tasks_placeholder:

prompt_generator.instructions_placeholder: Format, style, language and other technical parameters
prompt_generator.empathy_placeholder: Define the emotional tone and empathy level
